column4: your question probably got lost in the clutter, you'd better ask again (I don't know nfs)
yeah kind of a problem in channels like this ;)
i got a problem: mounted some network shares via fstab but they don't get mounted on boot - i always have to manually mount them. any idea why that is?
ah, I might I have the answer after all: the fstab is read before nfs is started ?
